name: Tasty Makeover: Match 3 Game
description:
Tasty Makeover is the first game that has everything you love! Match 3 puzzles, design, a ton of humor... One little slice of this game definitely won't be enough!

Emma dreams of reviving her grandfather's great restaurant, but she can't do it without your help!

• Rich, vibrant graphics
• Appetizing match 3 levels with colorful tiles
• Delicious, intriguing storylines
• A feast of beautiful furniture for your restaurant
• Tricky puzzles you can really get your teeth into
• Savor the secrets and romantic tales of small-town life
• Gorge yourself on exciting adventures
• Spice up everything with delectable humor

Tasty Makeover is a FREE match 3 game, but you can always improve your gaming experience by paying real money.

Got questions? You can find answers here:
https://mytona.helpshift.com/hc/en/23-tasty-makeover/
